entries.title: Watch: Woman gets arrested for PRAYING because in the UK there are certain places where that's against the law
entries.description:
Meet Isabel. She is about to get arrested for praying. Like, challenged by police "are you praying" and everything.

You see, in the U.K., it is illegal to pray in silence when you are standing alone on the street...and in the vicinity of an abortion clinic.

British authorities apprehended a woman for engaging in peaceful prayer outside an abortion clinic pic.twitter.com/8vxovbEeeu
— Clown World ™ 🤡 (@ClownWorld_) December 22, 2022

We first caught wind of this last week and a defense fund taking up Isabel's case shared her story.

To clarify, the woman was charged with four counts of failing to comply with a Public Space Protection Order.

The PSPO creates a zone around a specific facility to protect women from harassment by any means if they are seeking a medical procedure or advice at an abortion clinic.
— West Midlands Police (@WMPolice) December 20, 2022

A "public space protection order" is similar to what we have in America. The pro-abortion lobby gives pro-abortion politicians millions of dollars. Those politicians find ways to make it illegal for citizens to peacefully protest outside of abortion clinics. If you want to firebomb a Christian women's center, that's "illegal" in the same way shoplifting in California is "illegal." But don't you dare stand within x amount of yards outside of where they vacuum babies out of women holding a poster board.

But this woman wasn't even holding a sign. She was standing in silence. Police took photographs of her standing in silence, then confronted her with those photographs asking if she was in fact praying.

When shown pictures of herself outside the abortion facility by police, Vaughan-Spruce was questioned as to whether she was praying in the photos. She said she could not answer – some of the time she had spent praying, other times she had been distracted and thought about other things, such as her lunch. She maintains that both of these thoughts were equally peaceful and imperceptible and that neither should be criminalised.

It tends to be frowned upon to start a blog post with "yeah, I got nothing." But I'm at a loss here other than to say...this is how they do in the UK. In America, our government works around free speech...but we still have it kinda. In England, they don't.

Also, there are pro-abortion leftists in this country who will read this story and say "you're damn right she should be arrested!" Those people need to never be allowed power in America EVER.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Incoming GOP congressman may have lied about his educational background, his past employment...and being gay
entries.description:
2022 is ending with what could be an impressive political scandal. George Santos is Congressman-elect in the NY-4. He is one of the many Republicans that the suburbs of New York elected and single-handedly saved Congress for the Republican party.

HOWEVER, parts of Santos' background are being called into question. All the parts. Every single part. His educational background. His employment history. And for a guy who is supposed to be the first gay Republican elected to congress, he was married to a woman in 2019.

New York Times first broke the story. Among the inconsistencies:

  • Santos says he graduated from Baruch College. There is no record of him attending.
  • He claims to have worked at Citigroup and Goldman Sachs. There is no record of that either.
  • The person living at the address Santos claims is his has never heard of him.

Santos, through his lawyer, responded. Didn't deny. But they did respond.

pic.twitter.com/mn181XbqRR
— George Santos (@Santos4Congress) December 19, 2022
After four years in the public eye, and on the verge of being sworn in as a member of the Republican led 118th Congress, The New York Times launches this shotgun blast of attacks. It is no surprise that Congressman-elect Santos has enemies at The New York Times who are attempting to smear his good name with these defamatory allegations.

This was all on Tuesday. TODAY, we find out that Santos -- the first gay GOP congressman elected to officer ever -- was married to a woman...until two weeks before he launched his first congressional race as a gay republican.

SCOOP: George Santos made a historic run for Congress as an “openly gay” Republican, but he never told voters that just two weeks before he launched his campaign, he had been married to a woman. Me @thedailybeasthttps://t.co/cRjcQFscGM
— Roger Sollenberger (@SollenbergerRC) December 22, 2022

There could very well be a perfectly logical explanation for all of this. I look forward to hearing Santos respond to these allegations that he made up *waves hands* all of it.

All that said, there are democrat political consultants who need to be blacklisted from ever working in politics again. Whether these allegations are true or not, they were obviously out there. And NO ONE brought them up during the campaign?

If I was collecting a paycheck doing opposition research and someone lying about his employment, his education, his home, and his sexuality ALL GOT PASSED ME? I wouldn't be able to look at myself in the mirror ever again.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Government uses cringe-worthy Mrs. Claus video to push the schmaccine on your kids because we're still doing this
entries.description:
There is nothing leftists won't politicize. This includes both Christmas and your children. Up north in America Jr., the Chief Public Health Officer in Canada had an interview with Mrs. Claus, targeting CHILDREN, to encourage CHILDREN to take their schmaccine and mask up everywhere.

Why? Because it's well over two years past fifteen days to flatten the curve and we're still doing this.

Parents and Caregivers, I had a great chat with Mrs. Claus about things we can do to make this a happy and healthy holiday season. Here’s the scoop from the #NorthPole: pic.twitter.com/pgKY5NPEyV
— Dr. Theresa Tam (@CPHO_Canada) December 21, 2022

Citizen journalist Libs of TikTok held a focus group where they discussed this video, and the results were not good.

Holy cringe how is this real life pic.twitter.com/a7uVBC5XZ8
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) December 22, 2022

Let's set aside the "they're coming for your kids" aspect like they do when they go behind parents' backs and push porn, anal sex, and lobbing off your genitals on children. It's disgusting and gross and we'll be fighting it until leftists manage to outlaw all dissent as they've always dreamed of doing.

What I'm wondering about is the creative decision behind this video. There are people, presumably, who have functioning brains and who believe when kids sit down to watch videos, out of millions and millions to choose from these kids will select one from the Canadian Department of Health. And upon seeing Mrs. Claus give them instruction, these children who are under the age of ten (I'm assuming the target audience) are going to run to their parents and say, "Mommy! Daddy! I have to get a needle stuck in my arm before going to MeeMaw's house! Mrs. Claus says so!"

People who believe all that are employed by the government. It says so, so much about the state of the planet.

entries.title: O.G. Ice-T (original gangster) comes to Elon Musk's defense and tells haters what to do with their Twitter
entries.description:
Ice-T is old school and comes from a generation where sticks and stones can break your bones, but words can never hurt you. I'm sure the O.G. would have a more colorful way to say that, but he's now a grandfather who does Cheerios commercials. The MC's attitude remains. And he's one of the few celebrities who not only has positive things to say about Elon Musk's Twitter 2.0, he'll tell you what to do with yours if you don't like it.

Press the damn buttons that are available to you.

'In my opinion' Twitter is actually running BETTER right now.. Anything you don't like can easily be dealt with by using the Block or Mute button...
— ICE T (@FINALLEVEL) December 21, 2022

Much like his recent views on crime and gas prices, Ice-T speaks wisdom. Another Twitter user responded with what buttons to push. I have many of these selected myself and I've always had a pleasant Twitter experience.

Additionally, these settings reduce the rabble dramatically. pic.twitter.com/EjvWUuVYkC
— Eric Wojciechowski (@ericwojo) December 21, 2022

This is the problem with social media platforms outside of the political agenda of activist employees. If people don't like how YOU use YOUR platform, it's up to YOU or the platform to do something about it. Not the user whining about it. Never them.

The user could make use of all the tools available to mute or block people they don't want to see, but that's "too much work." Ignoring people who disagree with you requires maturity and not being butter soft bitch. So those users whine to Twitter, Facebook, Instagram etc. to do something. And unfortunately, 98% of those users also work in media. Few bitches are more butter soft than journalismers. Go figure.

As is often the case, when the companies respond they overcorrect and you wind up in social media jail for joking with IRL friends. Everyone should doe what Ice-T says. Lighten up, and if you don't like it, mute people.

entries.title: The next Balenciaga? Critics accuse Harry Styles of 'giving off pedo vibes' in new Gucci ad
entries.description:
The fashion world is at it again. Fresh off of the Balenciaga controversy, where the company felt that little girls interacting with fetish gear were a great way to sell expensive couture, comes this Harry Styles campaign for Gucci. (shout out to BizPacReview)

A performance piece starring #HarryStyles and the #GucciHAHAHA collection. Discover the campaign https://t.co/6SWoX3NzMP @Harry_Styles pic.twitter.com/urKTJRB50m
— gucci (@gucci) December 12, 2022

It shows Harry Styles, a grown-ass man, wearing a pink teddy bear shirt that says "I want more berries and that summer feeling," and carrying what appears to be a bed for a toddler. Critics were quick to say "eww" and "gross" and "dafuq is wrong with these people?" There was also confusion as to why Harry Styles would need to have a toddler's mattress with him.

It makes you wonder about who the target audience is for an ad campaign like this.

Gucci are having harry styles pose alongside a child’s mattress with a pink teddy bear shirt.

Why are all fashion brand ad makers sick creeps? pic.twitter.com/jQuIjnPRXt
— Sophie Corcoran (@sophielouisecc) December 18, 2022


Why does #gucci have Harry Styles, a grown man posing with a child’s mattress and a pink teddy bear t shirt? Im not loving this. pic.twitter.com/1Fc2kIDcjN
— Gillian McKeith (@GillianMcKeith) December 18, 2022

Other critics were much less charitable and felt the ad gave off certain illegal vibes. The kind of illegal vibes where someone should be locked away in prison for a very long time.

This screams pedo. Unless he has suddenly become a parent bad choice @gucci
— Aundria (@GodsDreamer2005) December 18, 2022


That single white mattress is giving pedo vibes, and I think you should have better judgement after the Balenciaga meltdown
— Coffee Pancakes 🥞 (@HarrieHedgehog) December 13, 2022


Teddy bear in front of toddler mattress? Doesn’t remind anyone of anything … 😳🫣 Hollywood doesn’t get it https://t.co/A3gXeh99Cb
— Jessica (@Jburs) December 21, 2022

This comes fresh off of the Balenciaga controversy, where if their ad campaign featuring little girls holding bondage bears wasn't enough, someone made it a point to include a copy of a Supreme Court decision on kiddie porn in the background. To this day, I am unclear about what item the company was attempting to sell.

America was divided by the Balenciaga ad. On one side, you had parents and decent humans disgusted that children would be exploited like that. On the other side was the New York Times claiming those rubes don't understand art.

As of this writing, neither Gucci nor Harry Styles have addressed the controversy. Though Fox News reports both Gucci and Balenciaga are owned by the same parent company, Kering Group.

entries.title: Watch: Stanley from 'The Office' goes off on epic anti-woke Christmas rant
entries.description:
This video may feel dated. Ever since Donald Trump singlehandedly won the "War on Christmas," none of us are afraid to say "Merry Christmas" anymore. But there was a time pre-Trump when everyone lived in fear of saying the M-word and C-word, lest you be holiday-shamed. Not Stanley Hudson from The Office. He never gave a f*ck.

Every so often, someone will ignore the fact that Americans love watching The Office today (it was the most streamed show during the pandemic) and claim you could never make The Office today. They might be talking about clips like this.

The Office- Stanley on Christmas youtu.be

I have been here eighteen years and have suffered through some weird thematic Christmases. Honolulu Christmas. A Pulp Fiction Christmas. A Muslim Christmas.

Muslim Christmas?

The rant continues...

Moroccan Christmas. Mo Rocca Christmas. I don't want. it. Christmas is Christmas is Christmas is Christmas.

Then Stanley really goes off. I don't think he's been this upset since street construction outside canceled Pretzel Day.

I don't want no Kwanza wreath. I don't need a dreidel in my face, that's its own thing. And who's that Black Santa for? I don't care. I know Santa ain't black. I could care less. I want Christmas. Just give me plain baby Jesus lying in a manger Christmas.

Stanley tells no lies. For starters, I refuse to acknowledge Kwanza as a holiday until I meet a single person who celebrates it. And I am 99% sure no one in the office celebrates Hanukah. If they did, there would have been an episode where Michael Scott made things awkward with a bagel buffet, a copy of the Complete Friar's Club Anthology of Jewish Jokes, and a Kanye West impersonator.

When you know a specific group of people only celebrates one holiday and you know which one it is, it can be a Christmas Party. No need to be a PC-corporate douche.
